text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
author: Philip Fisher

text: It's not whether you're right or wrong, but how much money you make when you're right and how much you lose when you're wrong.
author: George Soros

text: Health is the greatest of human blessings.
author: Hippocrates

text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

text: In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable.
author: Robert Arnott

text: Physical fitness is the first requisite of happiness.
author: Joseph Pilates

text: Artificial intelligence is the new electricity.
author: Andrew Ng

text: Your brain is like a muscle. When it is in use, we feel very good. Understanding is joyous.
author: Carl Sagan

text: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
author: P.T. Barnum

text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Time in the market beats timing the market.
author: Ken Fisher

text: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
author: Leigh Hunt

text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

text: If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration.
author: Nikola Tesla

text: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Walking is man’s best medicine.
author: Hippocrates

text: The greatest wealth is health.
author: Virgil

text: The human brain has 100 billion neurons, each neuron connected to 10 thousand other neurons. Sitting on your shoulders is the most complicated object in the known universe.
author: Michio Kaku

text: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
author: Epictetus

text: Invest in yourself. Your career is the engine of your wealth.
author: Paul Clitheroe

text: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought – they must be earned.
author: Naval Ravikant

text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

text: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
author: Warren Buffett

text: The doctor of the future will give no medicine but will interest his patients in the care of the human frame, in diet, and in the cause and prevention of disease.
author: Thomas Edison

text: Artificial intelligence is not a man versus machine saga, it’s man with machine versus problem.
author: Ginni Rometty

text: The intelligent investor is a realist who sells to optimists and buys from pessimists.
author: Benjamin Graham

text: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
author: Joseph Addison

text: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The question is not whether intelligent machines can have emotions, but whether machines can be intelligent without emotions.
author: Marvin Minsky

text: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
author: Albert Schweitzer

text: Every once in a while, a new technology, an old problem, and a big idea turn into an innovation.
author: Dean Kamen

text: Compound interest is the eighth wonder of the world. He who understands it, earns it. He who doesn't, pays it.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

text: Those who think they have no time for healthy eating will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
author: Edward Stanley

text: The pace of progress in artificial intelligence is incredibly fast.
author: Elon Musk

text: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
author: Richard Branson

text: The best investment you can make is in your own health.
author: Anonymous

text: Your brain is a garden. Your thoughts are the seeds. You can grow flowers, or you can grow weeds.
author: Anonymous

text: Never depend on a single income. Make investment to create a second source.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
author: Bethenny Frankel

text: The empires of the future are the empires of the mind.
author: Winston Churchill

text: To invest successfully over a lifetime does not require a stratospheric IQ, unusual business insights, or inside information. What’s needed is a sound intellectual framework for making decisions and the ability to keep emotions from corroding that framework.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Health is not valued till sickness comes.
author: Thomas Fuller

text: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.
author: Albert Einstein

text: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

text: The mind is like a parachute. It doesn’t work if it isn’t open.
author: Frank Zappa

text: Money grows on the tree of persistence.
author: Japanese Proverb
